errors.error_description: Added invalid command line parameters --port and --directory that don't exist for pyftpdlib
Referenced a non-existent configuration file path /etc/pyftpdlib/config.ini
correction_candidates: For advanced configuration, refer to the documentation at https://pyftpdlib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorial.html for configuration options.
For advanced configuration, create your own configuration file and pass it to your Python script.
For advanced configuration, modify the server parameters directly in your Python code as shown in the API usage section.
For advanced configuration, use environment variables or command line arguments as documented.
errors.golden_answer: For advanced configuration, refer to the documentation at https://pyftpdlib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tutorial.html for configuration options.
